Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275

Author: ComputerGenie ðŸ‘´ðŸ¼ðŸ“¢#7004
Content:
`why is it not possible to send 0 fee transactions in bitcoin cash?`
Because the base fork was of Core who (after satoshi left bct) decided that 0 fee was a default no-no (despite that satoshit from bct felt that fees should only exist for large weight txes)

Author: Alright#0419
Content: @kimmel (Pungo.io) if you want miners to mine 0 see txs, they need to set either -mintxfee or -minrelaytxfee

Author: Alright#0419
Content: not sure which is which, I think you want to do `-minrelaytxfee=0`

Author: Alright#0419
Content: but that doesn't mean sendtoaddress and sendmany will make 0 fee txs

Author: Alright#0419
Content: could likely very easily create an ac_txfee which just sets the default value for sendtoaddress and sendmany
